name: Hungry, Hungry Boulder
description:
The best game jam game you'll ever play in your life.

Made by: Takaya, Cheyenne and Ethan

Play as a boulder that just wants to eat through 2 maze levels. 

How to play:

Move with either arrow keys or WASD

Jump with space

Enter Pause Menu with escape

Hint: If stuck or did not have enough food, restart through the pause menu!

Good luck!
